description: This file defines multiple multimodal AI agents using the 'agno' framework, including image, gif, music, video, and audio generation agents, and sets up a playground for testing these agents.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent with specific tools, model, and instructions.

classes.name: Playground
classes.description: A class to set up a testing environment for multiple agents.

methods.name: get_app
methods.description: Returns the FastAPI application for the playground.

methods.name: serve
methods.description: Runs the server to serve the playground application.
